titleStmt.title: Independencie no schisme. Or, An answer to a scandalous book, entituled, The schismatick sifted: written by Mr. John Vicars. Which may serve also for a reply to Master Edwards his Gangræna. Wherein is discovered the vanity of those unjust slanders cast upon the dissenting brethren, whom they call Independents. With some hints added about gospel-government. / By M.N. med. pr.
titleStmt.author: Nedham, Marchamont, 1620-1678.

titleStmt.title: Independencie no schisme. Or, An answer to a scandalous book, entituled, The schismatick sifted: written by Mr. John Vicars. Which may serve also for a reply to Master Edwards his Gangræna. Wherein is discovered the vanity of those unjust slanders cast upon the dissenting brethren, whom they call Independents. With some hints added about gospel-government. / By M.N. med. pr.
titleStmt.author: Nedham, Marchamont, 1620-1678.

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Vicars, John. The schismatick sifted (Wing V326) and to: Edwards, Thomas. Gangræna (Wing E228).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
